attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Like many I hope in this Great country I am fed up with non stop football and the anti-social behaviour that follows it from Huga hoodies etc.I would therefore like to ask the Government to ban football. It will probably go underground but the bonus is that footballers wont be picked on pay but on ability once again which will turn it back into a real sport and you wont have football on tv all the time or all over the newspapers showing overpaid footballers behaving badly and setting a bad example. You also wont have to live in fear of Huga hoodie football fans beating you up.
People will also maybe start paying attention to a real sport such as rugby?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
